last_episode_to_air.name: Remembrance of Clips Past
last_episode_to_air.overview: While at Laverne's going-away party, the gang remembers old times as she prepares to get married and move back to Hickory.

name: Empty Nest
overview: Widowed pediatrician Harry Weston is a miracle worker when it comes to dealing with his young patients, but he's more challenged by the other people surrounding him: daughters Barbara and Carol; his wisecracking office assistant, nurse LaVerne Todd; and obnoxious neighborhood mooch Charley Dietz. Thank goodness he always finds a friendly shoulder (and a warm, wet tongue) in Dreyfuss, his enormous dog.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Harry is proposed to eighteen months after the death of his wife.

episodes.name: The Check Isn't In the Mail
episodes.overview: Carol gets all dolled up for a date with her contemptible ex-husband. Harry thinks Dreyfuss may be sick.

episodes.name: Barbara Gets Shot
episodes.overview: Harry tries to get Barbara to give up her police career after she is shot.

episodes.name: Fatal Attraction
episodes.overview: Neighbor Blanche thinks she is in love with Harry and comes on strong when showing her affection. An old friend of the family dies after an illness. Carol decides to move in and take care of her father.

episodes.name: Father of the Bride
episodes.overview: Harry is ecstatic when Barbara accepts her surgeon boyfriend's marriage proposal, but she has second thoughts the night before the wedding.

episodes.name: Harry's Vacation
episodes.overview: Harry thinks he has become a burden on Carol and Barbara when they send him away on a vacation, despite his objections.

episodes.name: Tinker to Evers to Tucson
episodes.overview: When husband Nick is traded to a Japanese baseball team, Laverne is forced to quit. A sick Charley camps out on Harry's couch.

episodes.name: What's a Father to Do?
episodes.overview: Harry makes plans to accompany Carol to see her photographs displayed in an art gallery, and also to attend a ceremony honoring Barbara with a gold medal of valor. The problem is, both events are on the same day.

episodes.name: Harry's Friend
episodes.overview: Harry isn't too happy when Carol begins dating his old friend.

episodes.name: Libby's Gift
episodes.overview: An organ that Libby ordered before dying finally arrives at the house and Harry becomes determined to learn to play it in time for his and Libby's anniversary. Barbara and Carol worry that he is going too far. A patient asks Harry for birth control.

episodes.name: The First Time, Again
episodes.overview: Harry is encouraged to spend a weekend alone with his girlfriend. Jeffrey Millstein's imagination runs wild after he sees a scary movie.

episodes.name: Full Nest
episodes.overview: Financial trouble forces Barbara to move back in with Harry but it's not all fun and games. A lonely Carol soon decides to move in as well.

episodes.name: Here's a Howdy-Do
episodes.overview: Harry doesn't understand why no one likes his new girlfriend, but soon realizes they were right. When the relationship ends, Carol, who actually liked the lady, questions her own instincts.

episodes.name: Strange Bedfellows
episodes.overview: Carol falls in love with a South American freedom fighter and announces she's going away with him. Jeffrey Millstein falls in love with Laverne.

episodes.name: Tears of a Clown
episodes.overview: Carol becomes public relations director of the hospital and causes a multi-million dollar lawsuit when she reveals the mental problems of local celebrity Poko the Clown at a press conference. Charley convinces Barbara to pose as his fiance to get a promotion.

episodes.name: Blame It on the Moon
episodes.overview: The Westons laugh when Charley says the full moon will bring love, but then realize he could be right. A rude doctor catches Harry's eye. Carol's finds romance when a man returns run-away Dreyfuss (who in turn finds love in the man's female dog). A stake-out leads Barbara into the arms of a high-school boyfriend.

episodes.name: Dumped
episodes.overview: Barbara falls in love with neighbor, Dorothy's nephew, but is surprisingly not phased when he dumps her. Dorothy and Harry have an argument when Dorothy blames Barbara for the breakup.

episodes.name: The More Things Change...
episodes.overview: The hospital's new owner forces Harry to move his practice after 25 years in the same office. Meanwhile, Carol tries to amend the past after reading Emily's old diary and Charley tries out a new look.

episodes.name: Man of the Year
episodes.overview: When Harry receives a Man of the Year award, his estranged father comes to town for the ceremony, but Harry gets upset when he learns that his father didn't think he could make it as a doctor. Carol overhears the conversation and thinks her grandfather is dying.

episodes.name: Cyrano de Weston
episodes.overview: Harry gives Charley advice on how to impress a new girlfriend, who turns out to be the same lady Harry is seeing. When a relative dies and leaves Barbara and Emily money, Carol is anxious to see what she'll be getting but isn't too thrilled when it arrives.

episodes.name: My Sister, My Friend
episodes.overview: Harry promises to take Carol and Barbara with him to Paris if the two can go one month without fighting. Charley wins a greyhound in a card game.

episodes.name: A Life in the Day
episodes.overview: Harry sees five patients: a week-old baby, a five-year-old whose father denies the boy's onset diabetes; a seven-year-old curious about sex; an eleven-year-old having the cast removed from his arm; a belligerent 14-year-old who uses drugs; and an 18-year-old picking up his medical records before going away to college. The end of the episode reveals that all of these have been the same patient at different ages.

episodes.name: Settling
episodes.overview: Carol's new boyfriend is all for marriage, but not consummation.

episodes.name: Harry Snubs Laverne
episodes.overview: When Harry is inducted into the hospital's hall of fame, he forgets to thank Laverne in his acceptance speech. Meanwhile, two young patients announce their wedding plans and Charley asks to be buried with the Westons.

episodes.name: On the Interpretation of Dreams
episodes.overview: His recurring dream (which includes running from a tiger, a pink kimono, and Ed McMahon) keeps Harry and the girls up all night, trying to decipher it's meaning. They end up at an all-night diner where they run into Laverne.

episodes.name: Between a Cop and a Hard Place
episodes.overview: Barbara finds out that her new police partner, whom Carol is dating, is married.

episodes.name: Just You and My Kid
episodes.overview: An old patient returns and asks Harry to be the father of her child.

episodes.name: Rambo of Neiman Marcus
episodes.overview: Carol and Barbara are witnesses to a mall robbery and surprisingly it's Carol who nabs the thief, not police officer, Barbara. Neighbor Rose hits Harry's car and offers to pay for the damages.

episodes.name: You Are 16 Going on 17 and I'm Not
episodes.overview: Carol objects when Harry asks her to tutor a boy she used to baby-sit, until she sees how handsome he has become. Carol feels guilty after the two end up sleeping together. Laverne misses best friend, Lurlene's birthday party because of a double work load at the office.

episodes.name: The R.N. Who Came to Dinner
episodes.overview: Laverne moves in with the Westons after a fight with Nick and proceeds to take control of the house. A young patient who can't get a date for a school dance asks Harry to take her.

episodes.name: Green Eggs and Harry
episodes.overview: Harry enlists the help of Carol when he is asked to write a children's book, but he soon finds out that Barbara has better ideas. Charley is smitten with another juror during jury duty.

episodes.name: Overdue for a Job
episodes.overview: Carol gets a job at a library, where she meets an obnoxious college professor. Charley joins a Big Buddy program. Barbara teaches Dreyfuss to play Frisbee.

episodes.name: A Christmas Story
episodes.overview: The Westons prepare for their annual holiday skiing trip until Dreyfuss runs away. Laverne refuses to accept Christmas gifts from Harry.

episodes.name: Change of Heart
episodes.overview: An overworked Harry has an angina attack but refuses to slow down and rest.

episodes.name: Harry's Choice
episodes.overview: Harry is thrilled when Barbara quits the police force, but feels he may have pushed her into a different job. Carol tries to save enough money to pay for Harry's birthday present: an oil portrait of herself.

episodes.name: Complainin' in the Rain
episodes.overview: Tired of her complaining, Barbara persuades Carol to go with her on a spontaneous adventure. Harry and Laverne recall the day she came to work for him, but their stories have several variations.

episodes.name: M.D., P.O.V.
episodes.overview: Harry tries to avoid a reporter who is doing a story on him. A young patient is on the verge of death and no one can figure out why.

episodes.name: Everything But Love
episodes.overview: Harry's visiting niece starts dating Charley. Laverne's friend Lurlene visits and accuses Laverne of being ""citified.""

episodes.name: Timing
episodes.overview: Harry feels ready to rekindle an old romance.

episodes.name: It Happened Two Nights, Four Costume Changes
episodes.overview: Laverne is told that Nick is having an affair so she tells him she is dating Harry. When she finds out she was misinformed, Nick refuses to believe that she made up the story about her affair. Meanwhile, Carol and Barbara disagree on how to get rid of a mouse in the house.

episodes.name: Love is Blind
episodes.overview: Carol dates a blind man and focuses only on his disability, ignoring the fact that he is rude and obnoxious. Jeffrey Millstein is nervous about a chess tournament.

episodes.name: Goodbye, Mr. Dietz
episodes.overview: The Westons come home to find that Charley is having a party in their house. When Harry tells him to leave and never come back, he moves away. Meanwhile, Harry unknowingly throws away Laverne's lucky hot dog wrapper while cleaning up the office.

episodes.name: Lessons
episodes.overview: A student has a crush on Barbara, who is working undercover at a high school. Meanwhile, Charley takes up golf, Harry teaches Dreyfuss to fetch the paper, and Laverne is convinced she'll become fat after looking at a family album.

episodes.name: Take My Mom, Please
episodes.overview: Carol and Barbara hire a maid, and then realize the family silver is missing. A young patient in need of a father sets Harry up on a date with her mom.

episodes.name: Did You Ever See a Dream Dying?
episodes.overview: Harry helps Nick buy a bar. The Westons take in a lost dog and then blame Dreyfuss for all the damage it does.

episodes.name: Still Growing After All These Years
episodes.overview: Harry realizes that his new girlfriend takes too good care of him, which is something he doesn't need anymore. Charley auditions to become a television weatherman. Jeffrey Millstein seeks Harry's advice on how to make friends in public school.

episodes.name: A Flaw is Born
episodes.overview: Harry is uncomfortable dating a more successful woman, a world-famous brain surgeon; Carol and Barbara plot revenge on an inconsiderate man who met Carol on a plane and promised to phone but never did.

episodes.name: Harry's Excellent Adventure
episodes.overview: Harry looks forward to his golf game until he has to cancel to help Barbara with her taxes and Carol with her car. Tired of having no time for himself, he follows a globe-trotting friend to Pamplona for the running of the bulls.

episodes.name: There's No Accounting
episodes.overview: Carol is drawn to Barbara's sensitive, intelligent new boyfriend and can't figure out why he would be interested in Barbara. Harry is bored by his new girlfriend, a lady who seems perfect for him. Laverne grows attached to a dog that Nick brings home.

episodes.name: Barbara the Mom
episodes.overview: Barbara fears she has no motherly instincts when babysitting her boyfriend's young kids. Carol volunteers at the zoo and finds that the pandas only mate when she is around. Harry is reluctant to let Laverne give him a flu shot. Charley attempts to write his autobiography.

episodes.name: The Tortoise and the Harry
episodes.overview: When a patient is depressed after his best friend moves away, Harry gives him a pet turtle. The boy becomes more upset when the turtle dies soon after. Carol talks Barbara into taking an art class with her. Charley tries new ways to meet women.

episodes.name: Mad About the Boy
episodes.overview: After being dumped yet again, Carol flips out and falls in love with the first man she can find: an oddball who passes out cheese samples at the mall. Laverne decides to spice up Harry's biography for a hospital newsletter.

episodes.name: Honey, I Shrunk Laverne
episodes.overview: Laverne quits when Harry complains that she is making too many office decisions without him. Carol talks Barbara into letting her join her poker game.

episodes.name: The Boy Next Door
episodes.overview: During a moment of weakness, Carol and Charley sleep together. Thinking perhaps their hate for one another is actually masking love, they attempt to build a relationship.

episodes.name: A Family Affair
episodes.overview: Harry suspects that Barbara's new boyfriend is married, and when he voices his concerns Barbara gets mad. Worried that Dreyfuss is getting too fat, the Westons put him on a diet, but then end up secretly giving him junk food.

episodes.name: Someone to Watch Over Me
episodes.overview: Charley wants visitors during a hospital stay and when his parents can't come, he hires actors to play them. A neighbor accuses Dreyfuss of fathering his dog's puppies.

episodes.name: Harry Knows Best
episodes.overview: A young patient of Harry's announces she wants a nose job. Charley thinks about a career as a gigolo. The Westons decide to take a new family portrait.

episodes.name: Whenever I Feel Afraid
episodes.overview: Laverne is fearful after a mugging. Carol and Barbara compete for a handsome new neighbor.

episodes.name: A Shot in the Dark
episodes.overview: Barbara mistakes Carol's boyfriend for a burglar and shoots him. He stays with the Westons to recuperate and only ends up getting hurt worse. Harry helps Laverne confront her fear of public speaking when she has to give a speech at an awards ceremony.

episodes.name: Sucking Up is Hard to Do
episodes.overview: Carol advises Barbara on how to suck up to get a job promotion. Laverne plays matchmaker for Harry.

episodes.name: The Man That Got Away
episodes.overview: Barbara tries to get a man she likes to ask her out. Laverne must cast the deciding vote on an important Hickory issue.

episodes.name: The Mentor
episodes.overview: Harry realizes his mentor is getting too old to practice medicine, but is afraid to tell him. Meanwhile, Carol and Barbara prepare for a piano recital.

episodes.name: The Dog Who Knew Too Much
episodes.overview: The Westons each pour their hearts out to Dreyfuss when the girls decide to move out after two years at home.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?
episodes.overview: Harry dates a 28 year old, which upsets Carol, Barbara, and the girl's parents. Laverne shapes up a nurse trainee.

episodes.name: All About Harry
episodes.overview: Harry dates a newspaper writer who begins writing about their relationship in her column. Charley is rendered impotent after a medical experiment backfires.

episodes.name: Drive, He Said
episodes.overview: Harry is supposed to get Charley back to the house for a surprise party, but instead the two end up searching for Charley's old girlfriend whom he never got over. Meanwhile, Carol, Barbara, and Laverne try to entertain the party guests.

episodes.name: The Last Temptation of Laverne
episodes.overview: Laverne's aunt Retha will lend a house down payment only if Laverne, though innocent, will assume blame for a car accident. Carol and Barbara meet an old man in the park who is moving into a retirement home and try to make his last day of freedom something to remember.

episodes.name: What's Eating You?
episodes.overview: Harry forces Barbara to spend a week at home with him and Carol, away from the stress of police work, when a physical reveals she has a pre-ulcerous condition. But as the week progresses, Harry and Carol find it is they who are creating stress for Barbara. Laverne tries to track down a case of Harry's favorite bandages, which have been discontinued.

episodes.name: The Cruise
episodes.overview: While on a cruise, Barbara practices for a talent show, Harry tries to avoid two ladies who won't leave him alone, and Carol finds the man of her dreams...who disappears when Charley steers the ship into the Bermuda Triangle. Meanwhile back home, Laverne redesigns Harry's refrigerator.

episodes.name: The Way We Are
episodes.overview: Harry looks forward to a visit from a childhood sweetheart, until a childhood rival also resurfaces. Charley wonders what FICA is when the company starts taking part of his paycheck.

episodes.name: 50 Million Men and a Baby
episodes.overview: Laverne's cousin leaves her baby behind and runs off to find her husband, who left after a fight. So while Laverne looks for her, the Westons take care of the baby. The experience makes Barbara want her own child and she considers artificial insemination.

episodes.name: Almost Like Being in Love
episodes.overview: Harry's lust for his girlfriend sparks marital thoughts.

episodes.name: Her Cheatin' Heart
episodes.overview: Laverne meets another man at a banquet and goes out to dinner with him while Nick is out of town. Meanwhile, when Carol confesses that she stole Barbara's first boyfriend at camp years ago, Barbara vows to extract revenge when Carol least expects it.

episodes.name: Food For Thought
episodes.overview: Carol quits her job at the library and buys a catering business.

episodes.name: Harry's Got a Gun
episodes.overview: The Westons buy guns after their house is burglarized, a choice they later regret when Carol gets a little trigger happy. Charley decides to head to the woods to do some serious thinking about his life.

episodes.name: The Dreyfus Affair
episodes.overview: Harry hires a world-famous vet to operate on Dreyfuss. Charley contemplates a career change when he is offered a job at Uncle Buzzy's Pirate World.

episodes.name: Country Weston
episodes.overview: Country music star Garth Brooks offers Barbara a job as security chief on his tour. Charley moves in with the Westons while his house is being fumigated.

episodes.name: Windy
episodes.overview: A hurricane hits just as the Westons decide to sell their house. Laverne's mother-in-law visits.

episodes.name: Talk, Talk, Talk
episodes.overview: Harry becomes host of a call-in radio show; Carol, Barbara, and Charley enter a chili cook-off.

episodes.name: Lonely Are the Brave
episodes.overview: Just as Carol conquers her emotional problems, she becomes jealous of Barbara, who is up for a medal of honor for saving a man's life (something she did by accident). Laverne upsets Harry when she asks for a second opinion after he diagnoses her visiting niece's symptoms as allergies.

episodes.name: If You Knew Andy Like I Know . . .
episodes.overview: Harry hires an old friend's son as an associate, but isn't pleased with the way he practices medicine. Meanwhile, Carol begins a relationship with the new associate and realizes he is arogant and self-absorbed.

episodes.name: My Nurse is Back and There's Gonna Be Trouble . . .
episodes.overview: Harry's old nurse Winifred returns to fill in while Laverne goes out of town, and a war erupts between the two ladies when Winifred reveals that she's out to get Laverne's job. While on a trip to New York with Barbara, Carol manages to annoy the entire planeload of passengers (including a nun).

episodes.name: The Son of a Preacherman
episodes.overview: As a favor to a minister friend, Harry takes in his brilliant young son as an observer, but becomes distressed when the boy confesses it's only his father's pressure that makes him want to be a doctor. Carol is excited about catering her friend Suzanne's posh Palm Beach wedding, until the groom gets excited by Carol.

episodes.name: Ex-appeal
episodes.overview: Carol starts dating Barbara's ex-boyfriend, but Barbara realizes she still has feelings for him.

episodes.name: The Great Escape
episodes.overview: While Harry and Laverne are en route to a medical seminar, an escaped convict takes Barbara and Carol hostage.

episodes.name: The Mismatchmaker
episodes.overview: Harry tries to reconcile a friend and his wife. Barbara hires Carol to cater a police party.

episodes.name: The Return of Aunt Susan
episodes.overview: "The Return of Aunt Susan" is the title of the 17th fourth season episode of the hit NBC sitcom and Golden Girls spin-off Empty Nest. The episode first aired on February 8, 1992.

episodes.name: The Unimportance of Being Charley
episodes.overview: Charley poses as captain of his ship to impress his visiting parents. Worried that Harry favors Barbara over her, Carol decides to keep track of how many times he does so.

episodes.name: Sayonara
episodes.overview: Nick leaves Laverne for a woman in Japan. Barbara goes undercover at a college sorority to catch a computer hacker.

episodes.name: Dr. Weston and Mr. Hyde
episodes.overview: The full moon on Leap Day causes strange things to happen: after throwing his back out, Harry begins to act very unusual; a series of odd occurrences leads Barbara to believe that a neighborhood repairman is actually Dreyfuss; Charley cancels a date to stay home and watch The Sound of Music.

episodes.name: Charley for President
episodes.overview: Carol persuades Charley to run for president of the home owner's association. While on undercover assignment at the hospital, Barbara tries to fool Harry with a number of disguises, but he sees through every one.

episodes.name: Good Neighbor Harry
episodes.overview: A good deed backfires on Harry when a neurotic woman refuses to leave him alone. Carol's new boyfriend seems perfect except for his hideously annoying laugh.

episodes.name: Final Analysis
episodes.overview: Just as Carol nears a breakthrough, her psychiatrist dies. Harry's new patient enjoys making jokes and smart alack remarks.

episodes.name: Roots
episodes.overview: The Westons (and Charley) travel to England to their ancestral home Weston Castle, where Harry is to receive the Sword of Weston in a ceremony. Unfortunately he gets locked in a dungeon after following a secret passage. Meanwhile back home, Laverne tries to teach Dreyfuss to ride a skateboard. Richard Mulligan plays three roles in this episode: the usual Harry, a butler named Basil, and a relative Baroness Daphne Weston.

episodes.name: Why Do Fools Fall in Love?
episodes.overview: Barbara agrees to drop by and check up on Charley after he receives a death threat. Seeing how much they have in common, Charley becomes smitten with her . Meanwhile, after Harry lets a young patient play with Dreyfuss, the kid tries to buy him.

episodes.name: Take My Garage, Please
episodes.overview: Carol begins dating Patrick, the Westons' sprinkler man. When his apartment is condemned, Carol persuades Harry to let Patrick move into the garage.

episodes.name: R.N. On the Rebound
episodes.overview: Barbara sets newly divorced Laverne up on a blind date with a coroner's assistant. Carol is jealous of the friendship between Patrick and Charley (who surprisingly understands the depth of Patrick's art).

episodes.name: . . . Or Forever Hold Your Peace
episodes.overview: Harry objects to Arthur's sudden wedding plans, which prompts Arthur to end their friendship. Carol tries to get Barbara to arrest her at a protest.

episodes.name: The Boomerang Affair
episodes.overview: Harry tries his best to get a lady to agree to date him, but soon wishes he hadn't bothered when she tries to control every area of his life. Laverne tries to conceal an ulcer.

episodes.name: Cruel and Unusual Punishment
episodes.overview: After finding a man guilty during jury duty, Carol tires to clear her conscience by hiring a former criminal to work at her catering business.

episodes.name: It's Not Easy Being Green
episodes.overview: Harry agrees to help Laverne hand out candy on Halloween, while Carol and Patrick are mugged after attending a costume party dressed as Madame Curie and Radium.

episodes.name: Dirty Harry
episodes.overview: Carol talks Harry into appearing with her on Geraldo. A young patient tries to increase his height so he will be tall enough to ride an amusement park roller coaster.

episodes.name: Timing is Everything
episodes.overview: Harry attempts to start a relationship with an old friend. Carol tries to assemble exercise equipment she bought for Patrick, and when she can't do it she reluctantly calls on Charley for help.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving at the Westons'
episodes.overview: Laverne is reluctant to accept Harry's invitation to Thanksgiving dinner and flashbacks to the previous such dinner show why.

episodes.name: The Body Beautiful
episodes.overview: Harry discovers that a patient is using steroids. Upset that Patrick is using a nude model in his work, Carol starts thinking she's not attractive enough and attempts an exercise regimen. Laverne is put in charge of fire drills.

episodes.name: Overboard
episodes.overview: A storm strands cruise passenger Charley adrift in a raft and he returns a different man. Carol and Patrick have a chance to work together, but she becomes jealous when he gets the job and she doesn't.

episodes.name: Emily
episodes.overview: When Emily returns from college, Carol decides to take her little sister under her wing, so to speak, and sets her up on a blind date with Patrick's friend. Meanwhile, Emily's rich boyfriend, whom she doesn't want to see anymore, doesn't want their relationship to be over.

episodes.name: The Sting
episodes.overview: The FBI wants Emily to help them nab her bookie boyfriend. Laverne teaches Charley CPR.

episodes.name: The Fracas in Vegas
episodes.overview: Harry and Charley travel to Las Vegas to see a boxing match but the trip is plagued with problems. Meanwhile, Emily wonders when Carol stopped being her cool big sister when Carol won't let her visiting college friends crash on the living room floor. Emily later regrets her comments when Carol takes control and starts teaching the whole group to do 70's dances.

episodes.name: Pardon My Flashback
episodes.overview: While gathered around the television for the Super Bowl, the Westons, Laverne, and Charley reflect on old times.

episodes.name: Dog Day Afternoon
episodes.overview: A small investment in a mall makes Laverne especially bossy. Carol consults an animal psychologist for help when Dreyfuss ignores her after she yells at him.

episodes.name: More to Love
episodes.overview: Emily is dating Carol's old school friend Danny, who compulsively jokes about his weight problem; Laverne is spending all her spare time on the phone gossiping with other nurses, but is aghast when another nurse accidentally hears her and Harry together in the supply closet and alerts the grapevine.

episodes.name: My Dad, My Doctor
episodes.overview: Emily upsets Harry when she tears a ligament in her knee and needs surgery, but chooses instead to follow a therapy program recommended by another doctor. Meanwhile, Patrick goes camping and Charley tags along.

episodes.name: Love and Marriage
episodes.overview: Carol is upset when cousin Little Carol visits and announces her wedding plans. Charley is sentenced to community service at the hospital and gets some helpful tips from Jack Trenton.

episodes.name: The All-American Boy - Not!
episodes.overview: Harry befriends a young shoplifter while volunteering at a free clinic and brings him home. The boy, an uncontrolled diabetic, later runs away, taking the Westons furniture with him.

episodes.name: Two For the Road
episodes.overview: Patrick and Emily drive back from New York together in his van. Meanwhile, Harry, who is home sick with the flu, must bear the brunt of Carol's certainty that something will happen between the two while on the road.

episodes.name: Aunt Verne Knows Best
episodes.overview: Laverne is too controlling on her nephew, who is in town to attend college. Carol is convinced her relationship with Patrick will be over before their nearing six month anniversary because no other relationship (except her doomed marriage) has lasted past six months.

episodes.name: My Mother, My Self
episodes.overview: Charley's mother arrives to tell him that she and his father are divorced and ends up falling in love with Harry. Carol goes on a trip to meet Patrick's mother. Laverne battles her insurance company.

episodes.name: Charley to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Emily is harassed by an obnoxious comic while working as a waitress on Charley's cruise ship. Laverne fixes Harry up with what she thinks is his perfect match.

episodes.name: Surprise! Surprise!
episodes.overview: It's Harry's birthday and he overhears Charley planning a surprise party, but soon finds out it isn't for him. Flashbacks from seasons past highlight this episode.

episodes.name: When the Rooster Dies
episodes.overview: Harry sells his pediatrics practice to another doctor, who ends up firing Laverne. When the hospital sends Harry to check out an inner-city clinic, he ends up teaming up with the owner, Dr. Maxine Douglas, to keep the place open. Laverne joins them as nurse. Meanwhile, Sophia Petrillo moves back into nearby Shady Pines retirement home and drops by the Weston house.

episodes.name: Bye-Bye, Baby ... Hello (1)
episodes.overview: Carol throws Patrick out when she realizes that he'll never grow up, but later learns that she's pregnant. Laverne goes too far when trying to organize things at the clinic.

episodes.name: Bye-Bye, Baby ... Hello (2)
episodes.overview: Carol can't decide how to tell Patrick about her pregnancy. Laverne refuses to tell Maxine a secret.

episodes.name: Mama Todd, the Sequel
episodes.overview: Laverne's mother-in-law visits, unaware that Nick and Laverne are divorced. Charley tries to persuade Carol to make him godfather of the baby.

episodes.name: Mom's the Word
episodes.overview: Carol is afraid to tell a date that she is pregnant. Laverne and Maxine disagree when trying to plan a baby shower.

episodes.name: Diary of a Mad Housewife
episodes.overview: Carol reads her mother's old diary and thinks she wasn't wanted. Maxine is annoyed by a mime and a hypochondriac at the clinic.

episodes.name: Mother Dearest
episodes.overview: Maxine's mother visits and drives her crazy, but then finds out she may have glaucoma. Charley finds out the sex of Carol's baby, something she didn't want to know. Harry and Casey MacAfee try to make a date.

episodes.name: No Volunteers, Please
episodes.overview: A shy woman volunteers at the clinic and starts sending Laverne flowers and cooking her dinner, which prompts Maxine to think the lady is a lesbian. Carol tries to get her unborn child enrolled in a posh preschool.

episodes.name: Das Boob
episodes.overview: Harry and Charley get stranded at sea. Maxine tries to overcome her fear of public speaking.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Cried Baby
episodes.overview: Maxine and Harry compete to sell opera tickets. After a series of false alarms, Carol gives birth to son Scotty while at the opera.

episodes.name: Superbaby
episodes.overview: When the baby starts ""singing Beethoven,"" Carol fears the hospital has given her the wrong child.

episodes.name: Read All About It
episodes.overview: When Maxine has a dental emergency, Harry steps in and gives an interview in her place, but the journalist makes the article sound as though Harry deserves all the credit for the clinic's success. Meanwhile, Charley falls for Dreyfuss' vet.

episodes.name: Love a la Mode
episodes.overview: Charley plans to marry a waitress from a pancake house. When she finds out they have the same birthday, Laverne thinks that explains why she and Maxine are so much alike, which Maxine thinks is ridiculous.

episodes.name: What's A Mother To Do?
episodes.overview: Carol joins a mother-daughter support group and ends up feeling that she is the worst mother in the world, especially after locking the baby in the car. Laverne thinks Maxine is dying when she mysteriously asks for time off after a check-up.

episodes.name: Gesundheit
episodes.overview: When the baby can't stop sneezing, Carol hires Studs With Suds to clean the house from top to bottom, and Sophia charges her friends to come and see them in action. But when they think it may be Dreyfuss causing the allergy, Harry takes him to stay with Charley, who doesn't want to give him back. Meanwhile, strange noises from upstairs make Laverne think the clinic is haunted by the ghosts of men who were murdered there years before.

episodes.name: Under the Gun
episodes.overview: Harry gets shot when a young boy brings a gun to the clinic. Carol has a date with a famous anthropologist, who opts instead to go party with Charley.

episodes.name: Brotherly Shove
episodes.overview: Charley ends up working at his brother's used car lot, but when he makes a big sale his brother takes all the credit. Maxine and Laverne become competitive when they start jogging to get in shape.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Shady Pines
episodes.overview: Laverne fills in for a friend at Shady Pines, where Sophia's boyfriend hits on her. Sophia catches the two together and thinks Laverne is stealing her man.

episodes.name: Hog Heaven
episodes.overview: Laverne's old biker boyfriend returns and the two rekindle their romance, which annoys Harry, who doesn't think the guy is good enough for her. Carol makes a memory video for baby Scotty.

episodes.name: Charley's Millions
episodes.overview: After receiving an inheritance, Charley assembles a group of people who have meant a lot to him over the years (which includes Harry, Carol, Sophia, and Don Adams from Get Smart) and takes them all on a trip to Mardi Gras. Laverne's hideous looking cat dies.

episodes.name: Half That Jazz
episodes.overview: Harry persuades his old jazz idol Sonny Baxter to come out of retirement and play at a benefit. Strange things start happening after Sophia vows revenge on Charley for dumping her niece.

episodes.name: The Devil and Dr. Weston
episodes.overview: A wealthy philanthropist eyes Harry. Carol tries to help shy Doris (who once volunteered at the clinic but now sales roll-on moose door-to-door) come out of her shell.

episodes.name: A Foreign Affair
episodes.overview: Maxine's boyfriend, an African cultural attache, proposes marriage. Sophia and Charley get Carol (who meanwhile has started to play the guitar again) hooked on the dog races.

episodes.name: Lordy, Lordy, Landlordy
episodes.overview: When their good-for-nothing landlord refuses to repair the problems at the clinic, Laverne threatens a rent strike and ends up getting the gang evicted. Meanwhile, Sophia convinces Carol to spend some time away from baby Scotty but she can't seem to bring herself to let him out of her sight.

episodes.name: Best Friends
episodes.overview: Carol is upset when her childhood friend returns and starts dating Harry. A patient at the clinic turns out to be a member of the family which has feuded with Laverne's for years, which sparks a mini-war between the two.

episodes.name: Absence Makes the Nurse Grow Weirder
episodes.overview: Harry fills in at his old practice and becomes smitten with the nurse. Laverne is upset because Harry forgets the anniversary of the day they started working together.

episodes.name: Let's Give Them Something to Talk About
episodes.overview: Rumors fly after Charley and Laverne begin spending a lot of time together, but the two swear they are just friends. Carol is excited about her new job at a local newspaper, until she finds out that she has been hired merely as a driver for the paper's teenage reporter.

episodes.name: Mrs. Clinton Comes to Town
episodes.overview: Reporter Carol tries her best to meet Hillary Clinton, who is visiting the clinic, but only ends up getting thrown in jail along with Laverne and Charley.

episodes.name: Just for Laughs
episodes.overview: Charley pursues a new career as a stand-up comedian and centers his whole act around making fun of Harry. Meanwhile, a mentally unstable woman befriends Laverne and Maxine battles the bus station when they move the bus shelter.

episodes.name: A Chip Off the Old Charley
episodes.overview: Charley discovers he has a son, who is a 17-year-old flautist. Carol fills in for Laverne at the clinic and tries to put a damper on Maxine's smoking.

episodes.name: The Woman Who Came to Dither
episodes.overview: Sophia, who is fed up with the strict Shady Pines manager, moves in with the Westons. Carol tries to help with the problem and ends up bringing all the retirement home residents to the house. Meanwhile, Maxine doesn't trust Doris, Laverne's temporary replacement at the clinic.

episodes.name: Carol Gets a Raise
episodes.overview: Carol wants career advancement and ends up in a compromising position with her boss. Meanwhile, Maxine fills in for Harry and speaks at an elementary school.

episodes.name: The Courtship of Carol's Father
episodes.overview: When Harry wishes his ex-girlfriend well on her new marriage, the woman realizes she still has feelings for him. Carol tries to set Harry up with a lounge singer.

episodes.name: The Tinker Grant
episodes.overview: When the clinic applies for a grant, a man comes to evaluate their request and leaves his notebook behind, which Maxine reads. Charley seeks Sophia's help when trying to impress an Italian girlfriend's parents.

episodes.name: Would You Believe . . .
episodes.overview: Harry is attracted to the minister Charley is dating. Meanwhile, Maxine buys Laverne's beloved truck.

episodes.name: Partly Cloudy With a Chance of Pain
episodes.overview: Maxine gets unwanted attention when dating a television weatherman. Carol and Charley make a bet: He can't mooch from the Westons for one week, and she can't call Harry ""Daddy"" for one week.

episodes.name: Single White Male
episodes.overview: Charley is uncomfortable when he finds out his new roommate is gay. Meanwhile, Maxine joins Harry's golf group.

episodes.name: Dear Aunt Martha
episodes.overview: Carol tries to pick up a man who wrote to the newspaper's advice column, but has trouble picking him out of a crowd. Harry's old navy sparring partner shows up with a score to settle.

episodes.name: Goodbye Charley
episodes.overview: After a death, Charley feels depressed about his own mortality and fears no one will miss him when he's gone, so Carol tries to boost his morale and helps him stage his own funeral.

episodes.name: Family Practice
episodes.overview: Maxine agrees to take care of a patient's children while the lady has gall bladder surgery. Sophia invites Harry to a Shady Pines square dance.

episodes.name: Grandma, What Big Eyes You Have
episodes.overview: Harry is attracted to a woman he meets in the park, but soon finds out she is married. Laverne keeps a parrot at the office while waiting for it's owner to claim it, which annoys Maxine. Carol goes overboard when shopping at a value size discount club.

episodes.name: Feelings, Whoa Whoa Whoa, Feelings
episodes.overview: Laverne is afraid to reveal her true feelings for her visiting friend Matt, and becomes jealous when Carol asks him to dinner. Charley poses for a nude layout in a magazine.

episodes.name: And Kevin Makes Three
episodes.overview: Carol is jealous over Kevin's quick bonding with Scotty. Harry and Maxine help Laverne learn to speak Spanish.

episodes.name: Harry Weston: Man's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Harry becomes Carol's boss' new best friend, which makes Charley jealous. Laverne auditions for a commercial in which she'll play the voice of a cartoon owl.

episodes.name: The Ex-Files
episodes.overview: Carol is afraid her relationship with Kevin is over when she meets his beautiful intelligent ex-wife. Meanwhile, Charley sues Harry when he gets sick after eating some old Chinese food from the Westons' fridge.

episodes.name: Stand By Your Man
episodes.overview: Constant interruptions frustrate Laverne's relationship with Matt, prompting her to go out with Maxine, Charley, and his friend Bud (who she ""hits it off"" with). Harry meets a woman whose dog looks just like Dreyfuss and persuades her to breed the two.

episodes.name: My Pal Valy-Val
episodes.overview: Carol goes off looking for a friend and ends up stopping a woman from committing suicide. Harry goes on a survival camping trip to be alone, but Charley tags along. A psychic opens up a shop next to the clinic, which excites Laverne and annoys Maxine.

episodes.name: Remembrance of Clips Past
episodes.overview: While at Laverne's going-away party, the gang remembers old times as she prepares to get married and move back to Hickory.

episodes.name: Life Goes On (1)
episodes.overview: When the clinic closes due to an asbestos problem, Laverne persuades Maxine to go to Hickory with her to help plan her wedding, which Laverne's mother is going overboard with. Meanwhile, Carol announces her engagement to Kevin, Harry decides to sell the house and move to Vermont where he's been offered a teaching job, and Charley and Sophia get lost on the road to Hickory. The wedding plans cease when Laverne elopes, and Carol breaks up with Kevin after hearing of Harry's move.

episodes.name: Life Goes On (2)
episodes.overview: With the gang fretting over Laverne's elopement, Kevin comes to see Carol and the two decide to get married with Laverne's father performing the ceremony. Laverne and Matt return unhitched and the ceremony becomes a double wedding. Barbara returns home to pack her things, but Harry has second thoughts about moving...until he is confronted by his dead wife Libby's ghost.
